General.Name: Nova Organic PCL
General.Description: Nova Organic Public Company Limited produces and distributes nutritional supplements and health beverages in Thailand, southeast Asia, and Hong Kong. It offers nutritional supplement products for beauty under the Donutt collagen, Donutt Total fiberly, etc. brands; nutritional supplement products for holistic health care under the LIVNEST brand; and nutritional supplement and other products, such as Lingzhi Plus Shitake, Matsutake, Q-Tin hair tonic serum, etc. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Phra Samut Chedi, Thailand.
